title: Minor Judges and Israelâ€™s Cry for Help
summary: Judges 10 mentions two minor judges, Tola and Jair. After them, Israel returns to idolatry and suffers under the Philistines and Ammonites. They repent, but God initially refuses to help until they destroy their idols.

faq.question: What happens after Israel sins again?
faq.answer: They are oppressed and cry out to God, who initially says no, but later shows mercy.

faq.question: What did Israel do to show true repentance?
faq.answer: They got rid of the foreign gods and served the Lord again.
